instructions:
Dry thawed shredded potatoes by squeezing in paper towels, then immediately add lemon juice and toss.
Add salt, pepper and onions to beaten eggs and then whisk in the flour. Pour over potatoes and mix well.
Melt shortening in a heavy skillet to 1/16 inch depth. For each latke add a serving spoon of batter to hot
oil and flatten with the back of the spoon. Fry at medium heat about 4 minutes on each side or until golden
brown. Drain on paper towels and keep warm in a 200 F oven. Serve with apple butter, applesauce, sour
cream, or powdered sugar. Makes 6 or 7 latkes.
ingredients: 10 oz frozen shredded (country style) hash brown potatoes, thawed
name: Latkes
